title: Performance degraded in 3.0.3.Final release
body:
### Describe the bug

I was benchmarking a simple app, which uses RestEasy-reactive, I am using a blocking endpoint where it receives a POST json body and it does some json manipulation and forwards it to another service.

I ran 2 pods in k8s with 1 cpu and 1 GB ram, with default thread pool and worker pool settings.

with quarkus 3.0.2.Final, they were able to serve more than 36k requests/second.
with quarkus 3.0.3.Final, it went down to 18k requests/second.

### Expected behavior

Quarkus server should be able to serve 18k requests/second.

### Actual behavior

Quarkus server is serving 9k requests/second.
